DOC.detailed_description: SNUMAP system portable , finger-worn , battery power device contains MEMS ( micro-electro-mechanical system ) hybrid motion sensor ( three-axis accelerometer three-axis gyroscope ) . The SNUMAP device consist wrist module finger module , attach patient 's finger transmits three dimensional motion wrist module storage analysis . The aim study assess tremor severity use tri-axial accelerometry gyroscope determine reliability correlation clinical measurement .
